db:abstract.db:para: The QCameraInfoControl class provides a camera info media control.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QCameraInfoControl class provides information about the camera devices available on the system.
The interface name of QCameraInfoControl is org.qt-project.qt.camerainfocontrol/5.3 as defined in QCameraInfoControl_iid.

db:section.db:title: [explicit protected] QCameraInfoControl::QCameraInfoControl(QObject *parent = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a camera info control with the given parent.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QCameraInfoControl::cameraOrientation(const QString &deviceName) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the physical orientation of the sensor for the camera named deviceName.
The value is the orientation angle (clockwise, in steps of 90 degrees) of the camera sensor in relation to the display in its natural orientation.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QCamera::Position QCameraInfoControl::cameraPosition(const QString &deviceName) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the physical position of the camera named deviceName on the hardware system.
